entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 6:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
